metadata.name: HackTool - Pypykatz Credentials Dumping Activity
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of "pypykatz" to obtain stored credentials. Adversaries may attempt to extract credential material from the Security Account Manager (SAM) database through Windows registry where the SAM database is stored

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pypykatz.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\python.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('live')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('registry')))

output.summary: Detects the usage of "pypykatz" to obtain stored credentials. Adversaries may attempt to extract credential material from the Security Account Manager (SAM) database through Windows registry where the SAM database is stored
